forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 13C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and clouds mixed. High 56F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Low 2C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Low 37F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High near 55F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 8C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 46F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 13C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 56F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. Low 53F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. High 14C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 57F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low around 10C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low around 50F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 7C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low near 45F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 14C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. High 57F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies in the evening then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. High 56F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers. Low 47F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 13C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 56F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 9C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 48F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High near 55F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 48F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High around 55F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
